content.text: I'm a teacher, I like to cook and read, I am married with kids, and I'm a proud Republican.

I want to be a fashion designer, I was arrested for stealing, I want children badly but not right now, my parents were always gone when I was growing up, and my best friend took my boyfriend in high school.
What are some of your favorite books?
I love all kinds of books, but my favorite authors are Jane Austen, George Orwell, and Harper Lee.
I love Jane Austen too! What's your favorite book by her?
I think my favorite is Persuasion. I love the characters and the story.
Persuasion is a great book. I love the way Austen writes about relationships.
Me too! She's such a talented writer.
So, what do you do for fun?
I love to go shopping, I like to go out to eat, and I love to watch movies.
What kind of movies do you like to watch?
I like all kinds of movies, but I especially like romantic comedies and action movies.
I like romantic comedies too! What's your favorite romantic comedy?
I think my favorite is When Harry Met Sally.
That's a great movie! I love the ending.
Me too! It's so perfect.
So, what are your plans for the future?
I want to be a fashion designer. I've always loved fashion and I think it would be so much fun to design clothes.
That sounds like a great goal! I'm sure you'll be a great designer.
Thanks! I hope so!
So, what are you doing right now?
I'm just working and going to school. I'm also trying to save up money to move out of my parents' house.
That sounds like a lot of work.
It is, but it's worth it.
I'm sure it will be.
Thanks!
